Docs.param: The $expand=children query string parameter allows clients to request inclusion of children in the response payload. $expand=path includes the path from the root group to the current group. $expand=ancestors includes the ancestor Ids of the current group.
The $recurse=true query string parameter allows clients to request inclusion of entire hierarchy in the response payload. Note that $expand=children must be passed up if $recurse is set to true.
